titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der Trinity College Library; Kopie im BA.

div.p: I cann't come to London, as originally planned â€’ on the 26th but a week later on Saturday October the 3rd. I'll arrive by the 19 00 = 7 p.m. train 1st Class only (Victoria) please meet me there if you can. If I don't find you at the station I'll wring up Argyll Rd to get further directions. Marguerite saw your photos the other day & liked them very much of course. I'll tell you the ones she should like to have copies of when we meet.
I'm looking forward to seeing your bloody face again!
